description.value:
Numbs on skin contact, if coating weapon it gains Toxic Quality for 1d5 Rounds of combat. In addition to toxic damage, if target fails the toxic-induced Toughness Test, target also takes 1d10 Agility Damage. No Good or Best Craftsmanship.

Requirements

Deadly Poison extracted from crushed Plaguewort leaves.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
